name: The Kassel Paradox
description:
THE KASSEL PARADOX

  A first person shooter like no other. The Kassel Paradox is a time-travelling, blood-pumping, PSX-styled shooter set in the streets of Kassel, Germany during World War 2 and a dystopian Cyberpunk future.

  Made in two weeks for the 32-bit Jam 2022, themed Another World. The Kassel Paradox is our first fully-fledged 3D project as a team.

  As William Cadieux, a young recruit separated from his platoon, players fight behind enemy lines in what seems to be a hopeless mission, until they stumble upon an unusual pair of glasses...

SEAMLESS TIME TRAVEL

  With the Time Travel Glasses in your possession, Time Travelling is as easy as pressing one button. Available at any time, usable with no restrictions, and completely seamless.

  Explore the war-torn Wilhelmshöher Allee in Kassel, Germany in two separate, hand-crafted timelines built from the ground up around the Time Travel mechanic.

UP YOUR ARSENAL

  With 6 different weapons to choose from, you're spoiled with options. Wield classic WW2 weaponry such as the iconic MP40, or go Cyberpunk on their asses with Laser Rifles and Railguns.

  Each weapon has its pros and cons, and they're all unique in their own ways. Find them all and experiment to dominate the combat puzzle.

PLAY IT SMART

  Use your Time Travel Glasses to your advantage. Pop in and out of the timelines mid-combat to avoid enemy fire, go behind enemies and ambush them, or get yourself some breathing room to reload.

  But don't just point and shoot! Weapon switching is a key strategy to your survival, since enemies from the past take more damage from weapons from the future, and vice versa.

Screen Tears Team JustTheDani Composer (Soundtrack) / Audio Designer (SFX) / 2D Artist / Concept Artist / 3D Texture Painting / 3D Texturing / Game Designer
